mapper.select: SELECT ob_datamodel_id, ob_datamodel_nm, ob_datamodel_format, to_char(first_create_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS first_create_dt, described,use_yn FROM ob_datamodel ORDER BY first_create_dt desc

SELECT ob_datamodel_id, ob_datamodel_nm, ob_datamodel_phy_nm, ob_datamodel_div, ob_system_nm, described, ownership, ob_datamodel_format, use_yn, first_create_dt , first_create_id, last_update_dt, last_update_id FROM ob_datamodel WHERE ob_datamodel_id = #{ob_datamodel_id}

SELECT ob_datamodel_id, ob_datamodel_nm, ob_datamodel_phy_nm, ob_datamodel_div, ob_system_nm, described, ownership, ob_datamodel_format, use_yn , to_char(first_create_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as first_create_dt , first_create_id, last_update_dt, last_update_id FROM ob_datamodel where 1=1
and ob_datamodel_nm like '%'||#{ob_datamodel_nm}||'%'

SELECT ob_datamodel_id, ob_datamodel_seq, property_nm, property, COALESCE(property_path,'') as property_path, COALESCE(property_structure,'') as property_structure , type , (select code_nm from comm_code where code_id = a.type) AS type_nm , option, described, first_create_dt, first_create_id, last_update_dt, last_update_id FROM ob_datamodel_conf a where ob_datamodel_id = #{ob_datamodel_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ob_datamodel_conf(ob_datamodel_id, ob_datamodel_seq, property_nm, property, property_path, property_structure, type, option, described, first_create_dt, first_create_id, last_update_dt, last_update_id) VALUES (#{ob_datamodel_id}, #{ob_datamodel_seq}, #{property_nm}, #{property}, #{property_path}, #{property_structure}, #{type}, #{option}, #{described}, now(), #{user_id}, now(), #{user_id} )
